2025-08-23T13:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-08-23T13:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-08-23T16:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-08-23T16:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-08-23T22:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-08-23T22:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

2025-08-23T17:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to strong wind, the following arrangements will be implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge are going to be closed soon due to strong wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng. Members of the public are requested to take care and pay attention to direction of the Police.
2025-08-23T17:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因强風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路將實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因强風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路即將封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。 公眾人士請盡量忍讓及留意警務人員的指示。

2025-08-23T17:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to strong wind, the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to strong wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng. Members of the public are requested to take care and pay attention to direction of the Police.
2025-08-23T17:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 因强風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因强風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。 公眾人士請盡量忍讓及留意警務人員的指示。

2025-08-23T21:55:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge have been re-opened.
2025-08-23T21:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經重開。
